chunk:
Bell Mountain Naturals Lummi Face Serum

Brand: Bell Mountain Naturals

Category: Serums & Essences

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Argania Spinsosa (argan) oil, Moringa Oleifera (Moringa) Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa (unrefined hemp seed) oil, Rosa Canina Fruit (organic rose hip) oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn C02) oil, Tocopherol (vitamin e), Lavandula officinalis (Lavender) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil.

Directions: Apply 1-4 pumps to a cleansed and toned face while slightly damp to really get all the moisturizing properties. Let it absorb for a few minutes before applying makeup.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
